title: SVG Scale
description: Scale of the exported SVG. Allowed options are x1, x2, x3, x4. By default, assets are exported as x1, the original size

title: Optimize SVG
description: Optimize SVG using SVGO plugin. This will remove all unnecessary attributes from SVG, making it substantially smaller

title: Keep Original SVGs
description: When enabled, original SVGs will be generated and stored alongside the component

title: Original SVGs folder
description: Folder to write the original SVGs to. Ignored when original SVGs are not generated to the output

title: Keep Original SVGs
description: Folder to write the components to

title: Typescript Compatibility
description: When enabled, definitions will be generated to be typescript compatible, otherwise javascript definition is generated instead

title: Use Custom Component Template
description: When enabled, component template will be used instead of the default ones

title: Use Custom Index Template
description: When enabled, index template will be used instead of the default one

title: Index Template
description: Template of the generated index file

title: Replace Values
description: When provided, each key will be replaced with provided value

title: SVGO Options
description: When provided, SVGO will be configured with these options. Check https://github.com/svg/svgo for all various options

title: Ignored Asset Paths
description: Ignored asset paths. By default, all icons will be exported, however, you can specify which paths should be excluded. If you include partial path fragments, all paths matching will be ignored (such as `icons` will ignore all icons in `icons/` folder and its subfolders)
